artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; small pavillion at the end of a dock in the falling snow; snow-covered foliage at L; grasses in water in foreground
inscription: 近江八景の内　堅田浮御堂　大正七年五月 {Ōmi hakkei no uchi, Katada no ukimidō, Taishō shichinen gogatsu} (The Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Floating Temple of Katada, May 1918)
markings: red collector seal: 杜品 {Tobin}; on back, red seal: 伊藤深水画　近江八景堅田　摺刷二百枚限の内　第四十六番 {Itō Shinsui ga, Ōmi hakkei Katada shūsatsu nihyaku mai kagiri no uchi, dai yonjūroku ban} (picture by Itō Shinsui, Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Katada, printed edition of 200, number 46); red square publisher seals: 版元 {hanmoto} (publisher), ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Lake Biwa (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景の内)
title: Floating Temple of Katada
